description: This file contains unit tests for the DataElement and DataStore classes, including tests for copying data, CRC computation, searching, and linked data structures using Google Test framework.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Represents a data element with methods for copying, CRC, searching, and manipulating binary data.

classes.name: DataStore
classes.description: Manages a buffer of data with size and buffer access methods.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: A linked list element for data, supporting nested and linked data structures.

classes.name: DataElementParser
classes.description: Parser class for interpreting DataElement contents.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies data into the DataStore or DataElement.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Gets or sets the size of the DataStore or DataElement.

methods.name: Buffer
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the buffer.

methods.name: CRC32
methods.description: Computes CRC32 checksum over data.

methods.name: IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the DataElement is valid.

methods.name: SearchNumber
methods.description: Searches for a number in the data.

methods.name: SetNumber
methods.description: Sets a number in the data.

methods.name: GetNumber
methods.description: Retrieves a number from the data.

methods.name: Search
methods.description: Searches for a byte pattern.

methods.name: SetBitNumber
methods.description: Sets bits within the data.

methods.name: GetBitNumber
methods.description: Retrieves bits within the data.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a value at a specific offset.

methods.name: Align
methods.description: Aligns data to a specific boundary.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Links data elements in a nested structure.

methods.name: LinkedSize
methods.description: Returns the size of linked data.

methods.name: LinkedElements
methods.description: Returns the number of linked elements.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Sets or gets enclosed linked data.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves buffer data from linked data element.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies data or linked data.

methods.name: TEST(test_data,simple_data)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: TEST(test_dataParser,simple_dataParser)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: TEST(test_linkeddata,simple_linkeddata)
methods.description: unavailable
